Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory750.jpg'}
{3: 'The sharp sounds of sirens blast through the air shortly after Noctis leaves, shattering the tranquility that followed the festivities.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With it, the Inver-Device sitting on No. 21 jumps to its end as she looks at the long road out of town through squinted eyes.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Something... is coming this way.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Right then, you see someone running this way from town.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Hey, what are y'all doing here?! Y'all want to run now! There are a bunch of Hetero-Creatures coming this way!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fann', 3: 'But it should have been three days from now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guess they decided to go ahead of time because we were sniffing around.', 3: '19'}
{3: 'The central plaza is growing crowded with people who have heard the siren and come out. All eyes are on Max now.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Sir...! Some of the Hetero-Creatures are in town now, and they've ****ing set places on fire... including the wheat fields...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Max shakes his head in resignation, unable to do anything about the influx of Hetero-Creatures and the fires devouring the town.'}
{3: 'There is only one thing he knows he can do now as the mayor of this town—doing whatever it takes to make sure these people are safe, that is.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "I... am afraid that New Oakley isn't surviving the atrocity. You all need to leave with the people from Babylonia now.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Max nods at everyone as he lets go of Fann's shoulder."}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'You all came from different places to this town, and you\'ve been working and living here following our principles of "equality" and "neutrality."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "You owe this town nothing, and you're under no obligation to fight this inevitable disaster for this town... so leave while you still can.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing what Max said, however, they all burst out laughing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Geez, what are you talking about? Are you drunk from the celebration?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "I know, right? ****! Dude totally thinks we can't fight to save our town!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Lady', 3: 'Son, this town is as much yours as it is ours. This is where we belong, and this is where I will be dying, too.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tough Guy', 3: "We might be ruffians, gangsters, or criminals, but we ain't leavin' the only place in this world that's taken us in!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: 'Hetero-Creatures, you said? Just watch me drive them all out!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking on with a smile on his face, Max pats Fann on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Well, well, well... I see you've all got your mind made up, huh? Guess this is gonna make for some good exercise after the festivities.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With it, the townspeople whip out all sorts of weapons, and the owner of the tavern pulls out his jukebox, making the atmosphere festive all of a sudden.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: 'Our bartender here will be in charge. Are we all okay with that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I mean, this is pretty much the only hope we have of winning this fight, being the ragtag we are...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course... just leave it all to me.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And those guys from the Purifying Force... No. 21, I need you to go and "politely" fetch those guys here for me. They damn well need to be part of this if they want to win!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera turns around. Holding you with a gentle grip, she whispers into your ear.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Look, I did tell Noctis that the "poison" isn\'t lethal... but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You better know it for real.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Guys, they're coming!!", 4: '1'}
